description: Gather facts about a single VM

username.description: The username of the vSphere vCenter.

datacenter.description: Destination datacenter for the deploy operation

uuid.description: UUID of the instance to manage if known, this is VMware's unique identifier. This is required if name is not supplied.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the vSphere vCenter.

name_match.description: If multiple VMs matching the name, use the first or last found

folder.description: Destination folder, absolute path to find an existing guest. This is required if name is supplied.

password.description: The password of the vSphere vCenter.

validate_certs.description: Allows connection when SSL certificates are not valid. Set to false when certificates are not trusted.

name.description: Name of the VM to work with
